name: ti-api-provider
description: Provides an implementation of the Titanium SDK

globalsOnly.description: Only instantiates Global objects and methods (excludes Titanium). Other options are ignored if this is true. Used for unit tests.

sdkPath.description: The path to the SDK that the project uses.

values.description: Sets the value of primitive properties accessible via the global Ti/Titanium object

key.description: The fully qualified name for the property, e.g. "Titanium.Platform.version". Note: the "Ti" shorthand name is not supported

value.description: The primitive value of the property

platform.description: The platform to use in evaluating require paths

modules.description: The set of modules the project uses

types.description: The path to the module. Only valid for CommonJS modules
Native modules are not evaluated, so the value should be null
